name: @dynamsoft/dynamsoft-capture-vision-bundle
description: The Dynamsoft Capture Vision Bundle module is a collection of Dynamsoft products and their dependent resources.

scripts.build-core: cd ../CORE && npm run build-bundle -- DCV CORE && cd ../DCV_BUNDLE && npm run build-dev
scripts.build-cvr: cd ../CVR && npm run build-bundle -- DCV CVR && cd ../DCV_BUNDLE && npm run build-dev
scripts.build-dbr: cd ../DBR && npm run build-bundle -- DCV DBR && cd ../DCV_BUNDLE && npm run build-dev
scripts.build-dce: cd ../DCE && npm run build-bundle -- DCV DCE && cd ../DCV_BUNDLE && npm run build-dev
scripts.build-dcp: cd ../DCP && npm run build-bundle -- DCV DCP && cd ../DCV_BUNDLE && npm run build-dev
scripts.build-ddn: cd ../DDN && npm run build-bundle -- DCV DDN && cd ../DCV_BUNDLE && npm run build-dev
scripts.build-dlr: cd ../DLR && npm run build-bundle -- DCV DLR && cd ../DCV_BUNDLE && npm run build-dev
scripts.build-license: cd ../LICENSE && npm run build-bundle -- DCV LICENSE && cd ../DCV_BUNDLE && npm run build-dev
scripts.build-utility: cd ../UTILITY && npm run build-bundle -- DCV UTILITY && cd ../DCV_BUNDLE && npm run build-dev
scripts.makeZip: makeZip --package=dynamsoft-capture-vision-bundle --version=auto --sampleBranch=_dev --structure=new --otherPkgs=dynamsoft-capture-vision-std dynamsoft-image-processing dynamsoft-core dynamsoft-license dynamsoft-capture-vision-router dynamsoft-utility dynamsoft-camera-enhancer dynamsoft-barcode-reader dynamsoft-code-parser dynamsoft-label-recognizer dynamsoft-label-recognizer-data dynamsoft-capture-vision-dnn
scripts.easyPublish: npm run update:dev && npm run build && npm publish
